description:
The course prepares the student to be able to make effective learning of basic soil mechanics. The course should have the pre-requisite of mechanics of solids/strength of materials course.

                                            Syllabus
                        Week 1 - Description of soil, engineering geology of soils and their formation, clay mineralogyWeek 2 - Index properties of soil Week 3 - Classification of soils Week 4 - Soil compactionWeek 5 - Permeability in soilWeek 6 - Seepage in soil and flow net construction Week 7 - Seepage in soil and flow net construction Week 8 - In-situ stresses and criteria for filter designWeek 9 - Effective stress principle and soil-water systems: capillarityWeek 10 - Fundamental of consolidation Week 11 - Fundamental of consolidation Week 12 - Shear strength of soilWeek 13 - Shear strength of soil Week 14 - Shear strength of soil Week 15 - Stress in soilWeek 16 - Earth pressure theories
title: Geology and Soil Mechanics
